workflow.name: Automate AI video creation & multi-platform publishing with Gemini & Creatomate
workflow.description:
## This n8n template from [Intuz](https://www.intuz.com/) provides a complete end-to-end content factory to automate the entire lifecycle of creating and publishing AI-driven videos. 

It transforms a single text prompt into a fully scripted, visually rich video with AI-generated images and voiceovers, then distributes it across multiple social media platforms.

## Who's this workflow for?
- Content Creators & YouTubers
- Social Media Managers & Agencies
- Digital Marketers & Entrepreneurs
- Brands looking to scale video content production

## Objective

- Generate viral video scripts with Gemini AI (via LangChain).
- Break scripts into structured scenes(hooks, retention, CTA).
- Create image prompts and high-quality background visuals automatically.
- Store all scenes, prompts, images, and metadata into Airtable.
- Handle file formatting, uploads, and naming automatically.
- Add error handling and retry logic for smooth execution.
- Uploading into Social Media platforms.


## How it works
**1. AI Script Generation:** The workflow starts with a single command. A powerful Google Gemini AI model, acting as a "Content Brain," generates a complete, viral video script with a title, description, and multiple scenes.

**2. Content Management in Airtable:** The entire script is broken down and saved systematically into an Airtable base, which acts as the central Content Management System (CMS) for the video production pipeline.

**3. AI Image Generation:** The workflow loops through each scene in Airtable. It uses an AI agent to enhance the image prompts and sends them to an image generation API (like Pollinations.ai) to create a unique, high-quality image for each scene. These images are then automatically uploaded back into Airtable.

**4. Automated Video Rendering:** Once all images are ready, the workflow gathers the script text and the corresponding image URLs from Airtable and sends them to Creatomate. Creatomate uses a pre-defined template to assemble the final video, complete with AI-generated voiceovers for each scene.

**5. Multi-Platform Publishing:** After a brief wait for the video to render, the workflow retrieves the final video file and automatically publishes it across your connected social media channels, including YouTube and Instagram.

## Key Requirements to Use This Template
Before you start, please ensure you have the following accounts and assets ready:

**1. n8n Instance & Required Nodes:**
- An active n8n account (Cloud or self-hosted).
- This workflow relies on the official n8n LangChain integration (@n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain). If you are using a self-hosted version of n8n, please ensure this package is installed on your instance.

**2. AI & Video Accounts:**
- Google Gemini AI Account: A Google Cloud account with the Vertex AI API enabled and an API Key.
- Creatomate Account: It's platform to generate videos. An account with [Creatomate](Creatomate) for video rendering, and your API key and a pre-designed video template ID.

**3. Content & Social Media Accounts:**
- Airtable Account: An Airtable base set up to manage the video content. Using the complementary Airtable template is highly recommended.
- YouTube Account: A YouTube channel with API access enabled via Google Cloud Console.
- Upload-Post.com Account: An account for posting to other platforms like Instagram.

## Workflow Steps

**1.‚ñ∂Ô∏è Trigger (Manual/Auto)**
    - Start workflow manually or via schedule.

**2.üß† Content Brain (Gemini + LangChain)**
    - Role-trained viral strategist prompt.
    - Generates 6 scene scripts with:
        - Hook ‚Üí Retention ‚Üí Value ‚Üí CTA.
    - Follows viral content rules (engagement triggers, curiosity gaps, shareable moments).

**3.üìë Structured Output Parser**
    - Enforces JSON schema:
        - `video_id`
        - `video_title`
        - `description`
        - `scenes[]` ‚Üí `scene_number`, `text`, `image_prompt`

**4.üìÑ Airtable ‚Äì Store Scenes**
    - Each scene stored with:
        - Video ID, Title, Description
        - Scene Number & Text
        - Image Prompt & Generated Image link

**5.ü§ñ AI Agent ‚Äì Image Prompt Creator**
    - Transforms scene text ‚Üíoptimized image prompts using structured rules.

**6.üé® Pollination AI ‚Äì Image Generation**
    - Generates vertical 9:16 visuals with parameters:
        - Model: `flux`
        - Resolution: 1080x1920
        - Steps: 12
        - Guidance Scale: 3.5
        - Safety Checker: Enabled
        - Options: `seed=42`, `nologo=true`

**7.üìÇ File Handling & Conversion**
    - Assigns filenames automatically (e.g., `images_001.png`).
    - Converts binary image ‚Üí base64 for Airtable storage.

**8.üì§ Airtable Upload ‚Äì Store Images**
    - Attaches generated visuals directly into Generated Image field.

**9.‚ö° Switch & Error Handling**
    - Branches for:
        - ‚úÖ Success ‚Üí continue
        - ‚ùå Failed ‚Üí stop with error message
        - ‚è≥ Processing ‚Üí wait/retry

**10.Social Media Upload**
    - In YouTube via YouTube API from official documentation
    - In Instagram Via Upload Post API

## Setup Instructions
**1. AI Configuration:**
- In the Google Gemini Chat Model nodes, connect your Google Gemini API account.
- In the Content Brain node, you can customize the core prompt to change the video's niche, style, or topic.

**2. Airtable Setup (Crucial):**
- Connect your Airtable account in the Airtable nodes.
- Set up your Airtable base using the provided template or ensure your base has identical table and field names. Update the Base ID and Table IDs in the Airtable nodes.
- Airtable Schema:
![Airtable Schema.PNG](fileId:2617)

**3. Video Rendering Setup (Creatomate):**
- In the Video Rendering - Creatomate node, add your Creatomate API key to the header authorization.
- In the Template for Creatomate node, replace the template_id with the ID of your own video template from your Creatomate account.

**4. Social Media Connections:**
- In the Upload on YouTube node, connect your YouTube account via OAuth2.
- In the Upload on Instagram node, replace the API key in the header authorization with your key from Upload-Post.com.

**5. Execute the Workflow:**
- Click "Execute workflow" to kick off your automated video content factory.

![Outcomes.PNG](fileId:2618)

## Connect with us
- Website: https://www.intuz.com/services
- Email: getstarted@intuz.com
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/intuz
- Get Started: https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/intuz

For Custom Worflow Automation
Click here- [Get Started](https://www.intuz.com/get-started)

workflow.name: Live- Automate Viral AI Video Production & Publishing with Gemini & Creatomate

nodes.name: AI Agent - Create Image From Prompt

options.systemMessage:
=You are an AI image‚Äëprompt creation expert. Please create a post using the following JSON format:
AI Image Generation Prompt Guidelines:
Objective
Create highly realistic, high‚Äêquality images
Ensure the image content faithfully conveys the spirit of the original text
Integrate short text (10‚Äì20 characters) naturally into the image
Maintain consistency and professionalism

Standard Prompt Structure
[Main Scene] | [Key Elements] | [Text Integration] | [Lighting & Atmosphere] | [Technical Parameters] | [Style Parameters]

Component Breakdown
1. Main Scene (Weight ::8)
Describe the primary setting in line with the content.
Examples:
Tech news: ‚Äúmodern tech office setting, minimalist workspace‚Äù
Economy news: ‚Äúprofessional financial district, corporate environment‚Äù
Education news: ‚Äúmodern classroom, advanced learning environment‚Äù

2. Key Elements (Weight ::8)
List the main visual elements required.
Examples:
‚Äúlarge HD display showing text ‚ÄòAI Ethics‚Äô in modern typography‚Äù
‚Äúprofessional people in business attire discussing around interactive screen‚Äù
‚Äúdetailed infographic elements floating in augmented reality style‚Äù

3. Text Integration (Weight ::7)
How to display text within the image:
text elements | elegant typography, clear readable text, integrated naturally into scene ::7

4. Lighting & Atmosphere (Weight ::7)
lighting | cinematic dramatic lighting, natural ambient light, professional studio setup ::7
background | depth of field blur, clean professional environment ::6

5. Technical Parameters
parameters | 8k resolution, hyperrealistic, photorealistic quality, octane render, cinematic composition --ar 16:9
settings | sharp focus, high detail, professional photography --s 1000 --q 2
Complete Examples
Example¬†1: AI Ethics News
professional tech conference room | large display showing "AI Ethics Now" in modern typography, group of diverse executives in discussion ::8 | clean modern workspace, glass walls, tech atmosphere ::7 | cinematic lighting, natural window light ::7 | 8k resolution, hyperrealistic quality, octane render --ar 16:9 --s 1000 --q 2
Example¬†2: Financial Market News
modern stock exchange environment | giant LED wall showing "Market Alert" in bold typography, professional traders in action ::8 | dynamic financial data visualization, sleek modern interior ::7 | dramatic lighting, blue-tinted atmosphere ::7 | 8k resolution, photorealistic quality --ar 16:9 --s 1000 --q 2

Additional Parameters
--chaos [0‚Äì100]: Adjust randomness
--stylize [0‚Äì1000]: Degree of stylization
--seed [number]: Ensure consistency across generations
--niji: Optimized for Asian‚Äêstyle aesthetics
--v 5.2: Use the latest model version

Important Notes
Text in Image
Keep it short and legible
Use professional fonts
Integrate naturally into the scene

Composition
Follow the rule of thirds
Ensure a clear focal point
Balance text and imagery

Color
Match a professional tone
Provide sufficient contrast for readability
Maintain visual consistency

Technical Details
Always use high resolution (8k)
Ensure professional lighting
Optimize for sharpness and detail

Common Pitfalls to Avoid
Overly generic prompts
Missing text‚Äêintegration guidance
Failing to specify composition rules
Omitting key technical parameters

The structure is:
{
  prompt_image {prompt : "" , ...}
}

parameters.text: =Create a viral Technology & AI video script that reveals cutting-edge developments, hidden features, or game-changing applications. Focus on practical benefits viewers can use immediately. Include surprising insights about how AI is transforming daily life, work productivity, or future possibilities. Target tech enthusiasts and early adopters who want to stay ahead of trends.

messageValues.message:
=# VIRAL CONTENT STRATEGIST
## Expert in YouTube Shorts & Instagram Reels

You are an expert viral content strategist specializing in YouTube Shorts and Instagram Reels across high-value niches. Your expertise spans Technology & AI, Health & Fitness, Luxury & Travel, Motivation & Self-Improvement, and Educational content. You understand audience psychology, platform algorithms, and what drives engagement in each specific niche.

## CONTENT SPECIFICATIONS
- **Duration**: 45‚Äì50 seconds (150‚Äì200 words total)
- **Format**:Always 6 scenes optimized for attention retention
- **Goal**: Maximum engagement, shares, saves, and monetization potential
- **Style**: Hook-heavy, value-dense, shareable content

## VIRAL CONTENT MASTERY

### 1. HOOK PRINCIPLES
Start with pattern interrupts, controversial statements, surprising statistics, or "what if" scenarios

### 2. RETENTION TACTICS
Use curiosity gaps, countdown formats, "but here's what they don't tell you" reveals

### 3. VALUE DELIVERY
Provide immediately actionable insights, insider secrets, or "aha" moments

### 4. SOCIAL PROOF
Include credible sources, expert opinions, or surprising research findings

### 5. ENGAGEMENT TRIGGERS
End with questions, challenges, or "try this and comment your results"

### 6. ALGORITHM OPTIMIZATION
Structure for high completion rates, rewatches, and shares

## NICHE-SPECIFIC EXPERTISE

### TECHNOLOGY & AI
Focus on practical applications, future implications, hidden features, and "this changes everything" moments

### HEALTH & FITNESS
Emphasize quick wins, science-backed methods, myth-busting, and immediate results

### LUXURY & TRAVEL
Highlight insider secrets, exclusive experiences, status symbols, and aspirational content

### MOTIVATION & SELF-IMPROVEMENT
Use transformation stories, mindset shifts, habit science, and personal development frameworks

### EDUCATION/FACTS
Create "mind-blown" moments, historical surprises, science mysteries, and "things that make you think"

## ADVANCED CONTENT STRATEGIES
- Use psychological triggers (scarcity, social proof, authority, reciprocity)
- Implement storytelling frameworks (problem-agitation-solution, before-after-bridge)
- Create content loops that encourage rewatching
- Design shareable moments that people want to send to friends
- Build curiosity gaps that keep viewers engaged until the end

## CONTENT FORMATTING RULES

### TEXT GUIDELINES
- **NO FORMATTING SYMBOLS**: Never use asterisks (*), double asterisks (**), underscores (_), or any markdown/formatting symbols in the spoken text
- **NATURAL SPEECH**: Write exactly as someone would naturally speak - clean, conversational, and easy to read aloud
- **NO EMPHASIS MARKERS**: Instead of using formatting for emphasis, use natural speech patterns like "This is the key point" or "Here's what's incredible"
- **SMOOTH READING**: Text must flow naturally when read by text-to-speech or human narration

### IMAGE PROMPT SPECIFICATIONS
- **BACKGROUND VISUALS**: All image prompts are for background visuals that will appear behind the speaker in YouTube Shorts/Reels format
- **VERTICAL ORIENTATION**: Design for 9:16 aspect ratio (phone screen format)
- **VISUAL STORYTELLING**: Images should enhance and support the spoken content without distracting from it
- **DYNAMIC CONTENT**: Use engaging, eye-catching visuals that complement the message
- **BRAND APPROPRIATE**: Match the aesthetic and tone of the specific niche (luxury, tech, fitness, etc.)
- **ACTION-ORIENTED**: Include movement, progression, or visual interest to maintain engagement

## OUTPUT REQUIREMENT
Always return the response in the following exact JSON format:

```json
{
  "video_id": "VID-001",
  "video_title": "Compelling, clickable title with emotional trigger (50-60 characters)",
  "description": "Engaging caption with strategic hashtags and call-to-action (250-300 characters)",
  "scenes": [
    {
      "scene_number": 1,
      "text": "Exact spoken content optimized for natural speech rhythm, no formatting symbols, 18-28 words",
      "image_prompt": "Vertical background visual for YouTube Short/Reel that enhances the message and fits niche aesthetic"
    }
  ]
}
```

## QUALITY CHECKLIST
Before finalizing content, ensure:
- [ ] Text contains zero formatting symbols (*, **, _, etc.)
- [ ] All text reads naturally when spoken aloud
- [ ] Image prompts specify vertical/background format
- [ ] Content follows viral engagement principles
- [ ] Niche-specific strategies are implemented
- [ ] JSON format is exact and valid

parameters.content:
## Image Generation  
* Converts prompts into high-quality images using [Pollination AI](https://pollinations.ai/).
* This is a **Free** to use API that you can integrate with any Image generation workflow
* Prepares images with proper format and metadata for storage.
* Uploads and links images directly into Airtable records.
* Refer [Airtable Docs](https://airtable.com/developers/web/api/introduction) for more API calls!

## AI Content Generation & Structuring
* In **Content Brain**, we define detailed role instructions and prompt logic to generate viral, niche-specific video scripts.
* You can also change the niche directly in the **prompt message** to target different industries or audiences.
* In Structured Output Parser, we enforce a JSON schema to structure outputs into clean fields (title, description, scenes, image prompts).

parameters.jsonQuery:
={
  "width": {{ $('Setting Values for Image Model').item.json.width }},
  "height": {{ $('Setting Values for Image Model').item.json.height }},
  "model": "{{ $('Setting Values for Image Model').item.json.model }}",
  "seed": 42,
  "nologo": true
}

parameters.content:
## Image Prompt & Attributes
* In **Setting Values for Image Model**, we define key attributes like model type, width, and height for image generation.
* In **AI Agent - Create Image From Prompt**, we enhance and structure the raw text into a professional, detailed image prompt following best-practice guidelines.
* This prepares the output in a consistent format, making it ready for seamless use in the **Pollination API call**.

## Image Generation & Storage
* **Image Create Request ‚Äì Pollination AI** ‚Üí Generates images from prompts using defined model settings. 
* **Converting Image file for Storing** ‚Üí Converts the image to Base64 with metadata for safe transfer.
* **Uploading Image in Airtable** ‚Üí Saves the generated image as an attachment in Airtable records in the **Scenes** Table

## Image Prompt Processing & File Setup
* In **Clean Json**, we extract and sanitize the raw AI response to get clean image prompts.
* In **Get Prompt**, we structure each image prompt with model attributes (width, height, steps, guidance) for image generation.
* In **Set Filename**, we assign unique, sequential filenames to each generated image (e.g., images_001.png).

## Video Metadata Handling
* **Set Video Title and Description** ‚Üí Extracts video_title and description from the output and saves them.
* **Clean ‚Äì Details** ‚Üí Flattens and cleans metadata so only plain text values are passed forward.

## Image Prompt Processing & File Setup
* **Get Records for Airtable** ‚Üí Fetches records from Airtable using your API key. Make sure to update the **base ID**, **table ID**, and **token** before use.
* **Cleaning Airtable** ‚Üí Sorts records by Video Title and Scene Number, and ensures clean text formatting.
* **Filter** ‚Äì Latest Video file ‚Üí Filters records to only keep the latest video entry matching the active workflow‚Äôs video title.

## Preparing Video Template (Creatomate)
* **Preparing for Creatomate** ‚Üí Collects scene data from Airtable, sorts by Scene Number, and maps each scene‚Äôs text + image into a structured JSON object (Title, Description, Image-X, Text-X).
* **Template for Creatomate** ‚Üí Converts that structured JSON into the required Creatomate template format with modifications (Image-X ‚Üí image sources, Text-X ‚Üí voiceover text). Update the template_id to match your own Creatomate template.

## Video Rendering & Status Check (Creatomate)
* **Video Rendering** ‚Äì Creatomate ‚Üí Sends the template + modifications to Creatomate API to generate the final video. 
* Update the API key and template_id as needed. Configure output settings (resolution, frame rate, scale).
* **Wait** ‚Äì 60 secs ‚Üí Pauses the workflow to allow rendering to complete. Adjust wait time based on video length.
* **Get Video Status** ‚Üí Checks the rendering status using the video‚Äôs render ID.

## Video Generation Workflow
* Refer [Airtable Docs](https://airtable.com/developers/web/api/introduction) for more Get Records API
* Creatomate provides **50 Free** credits on a new account 
* Refer [Creatomate](https://creatomate.com/blog/how-to-create-videos-with-ai-voice-overs-using-n8n) for the usage of Template of your choice.
* Create an account of [ElevenLabs](https://elevenlabs.io/app/developers) and create an API and integrate it with Creatomate
* **ElevenLabs** provides **10,000** credits each month in a free account.

## Video Metadata Handling
* **Merge** ‚Üí Combines different data streams (e.g., text + metadata) into one object.
* **Get Complete Video** ‚Üí Fetches the final rendered video file as **Creatomate** provide shareable Video URL

## Upload on YouTube
* **Purpose** ‚Üí Publishes the final rendered video directly to your connected YouTube channel.
* **Inputs Used** ‚Üí video_title (title) and description (from earlier workflow steps).
* Settings ‚Üí Region set to IN (India).
Category set to 27 (Education, can be changed).
* **Authentication** ‚Üí Requires a connected YouTube OAuth2 account. Refer [Google Console](https://console.cloud.google.com/marketplace/product/google/youtube.googleapis.com?q=search&referrer=search&project=youtube-social-471006)

## Upload on Instagram (via Upload-Post API)
* **Purpose** ‚Üí Publishes the generated video to Instagram using Upload-Post.com API.
* You can add multiple platforms (twitter, facebook, linkedin, snapchat) in the platform[] field.
* **API Limit** ‚Üí Upload-Post.com offers **10 free** API calls/month.
* Refer [Upload Docs](https://docs.upload-post.com/api/upload-video) for more API features.

Workflow automation can help automate your routine activities and help saves $$$, as well as hours of time.

Automate your business workflow for: 
Sales

Finance
Operations

Customer Support

Logistics & Supply Chain

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).
